    You're eligible for a Genius discount at The Mulberry Bangkok Khaosan Road! To save at this property, all you have to do is sign in.

    Decorated with vintage Thai memorabilia, value-for-money rooms with air conditioning are available at The Mulberry Bangkok Khaosan Road. Centrally located along colourful Khaosan Road, it has an outdoor pool and free Wi-Fi.

    The Mulberry Bangkok Khaosan Road is less than 2.5 miles from shopping options at Siam Paragon or MBK Shopping Mall. It is 1.9 miles from Hua Lamphong Train Station.

    Unique yet cosy, rooms at The Mulberry Bangkok Khaosan Road are each equipped with a TV with cable/satellite channels and a minibar. En suite tiled bathrooms come with shower facilities.

    Guests may take a refreshing dip in the roof-top swimming pool or simply enjoy the lounge chairs around it while soaking up the sun. Other facilities include currency exchange, convenience stores and an internet cafe.

    Couples particularly like the location — they rated it 8.3 for a two-person trip.

    The Mulberry Bangkok Khaosan Road has been welcoming Booking.com guests since 6 Nov 2009.

    • When booking does your hotel provide Sha+ certificate required for entry?

      Answered on 18 April 2022
    • Hi, how much does it cost to store the luggage for a few hours after check-out?
      We are pleased to inform you that after the checking out process, you are able to leave your luggage in our luggage storage room. We provide this serv...
      Answered on 8 March 2020
    • Check in time states 14:00-00:00 however my flight doesn't land until 23:55, is there any leeway on check in times?
      We do provide 24 hours front desk service for check-in.
      Answered on 19 February 2020
    • Can i pay by cash? and When i arrived Do i need to show my credit card that i filled for my booking ?
      You are able to make the payment by cash (Thai Baht) upon arrival date. No need to show the credit card that you had filled.
      Answered on 10 October 2020
    • Hi is it possible to fit 2 adults and a 4 year old child in one room?
      The maximum total number of guests is 3 people. Kindly to make a book for rooms.
      Answered on 27 June 2022

    The fine print

    Please note that the name of the credit card holder must be the same as the main guest's name and credit card must be presented to the hotel upon check-in. Otherwise, the guests are requested to pay in cash.

    Guests are required to show a photo identification and credit card upon check-in. Please note that all Special Requests are subject to availability and additional charges may apply.

    Please inform The Mulberry Bangkok Khaosan Road in advance of your expected arrival time. You can use the Special Requests box when booking, or contact the property directly with the contact details provided in your confirmation.
